scripts.start: concurrently "yarn run server:dev" "cross-env BROWSER=chrome yarn run start-client"
scripts.start-client: cd ../client && cross-env HOST=localhost PORT=3003 yarn start
scripts.build-client: cd ../client && yarn run build && mv build ../server/view
scripts.start-electron: wait-on http://localhost:3003 && cross-env NODE_ENV=production WHITE_LIST=http://localhost:3003 PORT=8083 electron electron-starter
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn run start-client" "yarn run start-electron"
scripts.build-electron: yarn run clean && yarn run build-client && yarn run electron-build
scripts.build-electron-deb: yarn run clean && yarn run build-client && yarn run electron-builder --linux deb
